relation: Shasta Joined: Oct 14, 2008 Posts: 2 Other Topics

Posted Oct 14, 2008 at 9:52:14 PM Subject: RiT or Response to Intervention Hi folks - I need some information and would like to have some parental input on the above subject. Response to Intervention. I am wanting to see if parents of children with learning disabilities are aware of RiT? how did you learn about it, what sources if any do you have as parents to find out more information about RiT, if your child's school district uses it If you as a parent find it exicting or have concerns about RiT? I'm curious about the model because I am wondering if it could aid in helping children to receive services quicker or not. Thanks for your input and insight.
